analysis: The project is a website about black holes with a focus on animations and interactive elements. The current theme needs to be enhanced to better reflect the cosmic and mysterious nature of black holes. The CSS file should include dark, cosmic themes with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The HTML file should have a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices. The JavaScript file needs to be updated to fix syntax errors and ensure all functions are properly implemented.

improvements.description: Enhance the CSS file with a dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements.
Add a mobile-friendly navigation menu with a hamburger icon for better usability on mobile devices.
Fix the syntax errors in the showSlide function and complete the JavaScript content to ensure all functions are properly implemented.
